title: Minder
description: Aleyn came to Bai's planet with one purpose, to steal his child and run like hell. Erasing his memory of their night together helped her make her getaway, but leaving her scent behind was her undoing. Trapped in Bai'sï¿½custody, Aleyn has to come to a few realizations. One, she has chosen him for more than his incredible ass, and two, his people have the right to kill her for her first week there. Reading minds has never been more critical for Aleyn and the possibility of her life with Baileez.
author: Viola Grace
